Name: French Mule
Ingredients: 12.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled mug or glass whilst also pouring ginger beer.
Review: This French answer to the vodka-based Moscow Mule uses cognac to make a more robustly flavoured, long, refreshing drink.
History: A variation on the Moscow Mule .
Nutrition: One serving of French Mule contains 200 calories
Garnish: Lime wedge or mint sprig bouquet
